title: A Little Favor
description: This short story is set in Europe before the start of World War Two, Jillian tours the clubs as a jazz singer to put a little adventure into her life.  She gets more than she bargains for when she does a little favor for the girl who has her eye.  She winds up running for her life and discovering a calling that gives her a purpose in life that is bigger than herself.
author: Erik Schubach
